name: Mob eCommerce
tag_list: mobile, ecommerce, solution, app, application, iphone, android, commerce, storefront, shopping, cart, software, virtuemart, prestashop, for, magento, joomla
overview:
Mob eCommerce : It is very important for the Ecommerce stores to get into the mobile platform such as IPhone, Android, Windows Mobile and RIM. The unique products of Mob Ecommerce will provide instant solutions to ecommerce stores to go mobile at ease with excellence. We have IPhone and Andorid Apps Solutions to take your Ecommerce stores instantly to mobile apps market at ease.

How it Works : We have developed readymade IPhone and Android Applications which can be integrated into any of your Ecommerce store. Also, we have developed solutions for Magento, Prestashop and VitureMart. We are also in the process of integrating our Mobile Apps to be integrated into various other Ecommerce Platforms. The Mob Ecommerce application is designed to work with Ecommerce stores, which is developed in other platforms irrespective of technology used. Our expert technical team will integrate it and ensure that it’s smooth functioning once and for all.

Advantages : Taking your Ecommerce stores to the mobile platforms is not an option anymore because,

  • Your competition is already getting there.
  • It will help your buyer to make the purchase “on the go.”
  • Push special deals instantly to the buyers.
  • Ability to tap the untapped market.
  • Mobile Commerce is the Future.

Supported Ecommerce Platforms : Mob Ecommerce applications can be integrated with any ecommerce store. However, we have readymade solutions for the following Ecommerce Platforms,

  • Magento Ecommerce
  • PrestaShop
  • Virtuemart (Joomla) Our team is working on making ecommerce stores for the platforms such as OSCommerce, Zen Cart and Ubercart and more. It does not mean that Mob Ecommerce cannot work with other Ecommerce platform. It just needs a customization to work with other platforms.

Supported Mobile Platforms : Mob Ecommerce App are ready to work with all the IPhone and Android devices. We are in the process of Integrating the system with Windows Mobile and RIM(Blackberry).
